column4: so isn't there any video player which lets me decide from which position to which position to automatically play each film on a playlist?
could you tell me which flag(s) of console mplayer you're refering to?
but does vlc also support subtitles?
I dunno, I was just guessing.
yes..vlc duz suport subtitles..it plays everything
then why isn't it as much talked about as mplayer or kaffeine?!
i was hoping it also had a gui
cool! thanks a lot for you help.
